song_name: The Continuing Story of Bungalow Bill
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Continuing Story of Bungalow Bill is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: The Continuing Story of Bungalow Bill has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Minor,  and C Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
